item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: hong@mrleong.net (Hong)
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Klang Valley. Vegetarian Cameleon Beancurd Vegetarian Restaurant 甘味林素食餐厅 Address: 1, Jalan Thamboosamy, Off, Jalan Putra, Wilayah Persekutuan, 50350 Kuala Lumpur Yuet Sum Hin Vegetarian Restaurant 悦心轩 Address: No.8, Ground Floor, Jalan 1/77, Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, Off, Jln Pudu, 55100 Kuala Lumpur Yong Tau Fu 126 Hakka Yong Tau Fu Address: Gerai No. 1, Jalan Intan Baiduri 11d, Taman Intan Baiduri, 52100 Kuala Lumpur

item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: hong@mrleong.net (Hong)
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Johor. Burger Woodfire Address: Eco Spring, SL006, Spring Labs, Lot D, Jalan Ekoflora Utama, 81100 Johor Bahru, Johor Chicken Chop Gebekk western Food Address: Unit SL-007, Spring Lab, Lok K, Jalan Ekoflora Utama, Taman Ekoflora, 81100 Johor Bahru, Johor Restoran Hua Mui 华美 Address: 131, Jalan Trus, Bandar Johor Bahru, 80000 Johor Bahru, Johor Chicken Rice Kakilang Kopitiam 自己人美食阁
